idea: eMotion Biologics specializes in the research, development and processing of human tissue based biological and regenerative medicinal products that will help shape the future of the healthcare landscape in India and beyond. Our vision is to recycle the gift of life to deliver novel and world-class therapeutic products to help improve the health and living conditions of patients.
name: eMotion Biologics

idea: Bold Media Digital is one of the leading Mobile Digital marketing company headquartered in Mumbai, which is engaged in acquisition of, value addition to and distribution, of mobile contents across emerging markets such as India, Middle East, Africa, South East Asia and Latin America. Our operations comprise of our subscription business, pay per use business along with Fantasy sports services & Music Video Contents in several international languages.Bold Media Digital is a global advertising and technology organisation that helps your business grow. With our primary focus on the mobile app ecosystem, we provide data-driven high-performance solutions for advertising and monetisation.

idea: After years of Research and Development we developed a product unlike the ones in its field. An X-ray machine which is battery operated, as light as as a travel bag and gives only as much radiation as is required. The product promises a bright market due to its wide field of application. We wish to start off with diagnostic imaging and then move ahead to industrial and security application.
name: XSNAP IMAGING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Introducing ourselves, we are “Adroit Alliance”, an I.T. solutions company with one goal, bridging your present with the future. We believe in creating pocket friendly services, so that everyone can afford to stay at the same pace at the same time, when it comes to the fast growing field of Technology, Modernization and the Digital World.
We understand the problems and the integrities faced by today's businesses and thus we try to completely eliminate all the hurdles faced by them. With our expertise; we get the latest technology to work on, so the clients can stay updated & progressed.
We will expand your possibilities by giving you a global recognition which will help in your growth by leaps and bounds. Our services include:
• UI/UX Design
• Website Development
• Mobile App Development
• Marketing
• Hosting & Services
• Software Solutions
Kindly visit our website to know more about our projects and feel free to contact us to process further. We will be happy to receive your indispensable feedback & queries.
www.adroitalliance.in
name: ADROIT ALLIANCE
